The Senate must pass the George Floyd #JusticeInPolicing Act to increase police accountability improve the culture of law enforcement & build trust between law enforcement & local communities.
Real justice for George Floyd Breonna Taylor Tamir Rice & countless others means ending police brutality & addressing the systemic issues that enable racism & inequity to persist.
Two years ago the murder of George Floyd by a Minneapolis police officer shocked me. For many in Black & Brown communities it was a culmination of fears that any one of their neighbors might be next.
@user As Co-Chair of the Friends of New Zealand Caucus I will continue working to strengthen the bilateral relationship. @user
@user New Zealand is a valued ally and economic partner. On trade jobs security and diplomacy New Zealand and the United States will be in a stronger position with increased cooperation.
